name: Harman Croy
content:
Harman Croy was a human male lieutenant who served in the military of the First Order during its war with the Resistance. An ambitious officer who was eager to climb in rank, the lieutenant took charge of an investigation of the Halcyon, a commercial MPO-1400 Purgill-class star cruiser of the Chandrila Star Line, which was suspected of containing Resistance sympathizers among its crew and passengers. In his new role, the lieutenant saw no issue in abusing his power aboard the ship.
The First Order lieutenant is set to appear in Star Wars: Galactic Starcruiser, an immersive hotel experience that opened in March 1st, 2022 at the Walt Disney World Resort. In audition sides for the character by The Walt Disney Company, the lieutenant posits that a Resistance spy is located among a group of the Halcyon's guests and threatens to extinguish the entire party should the individual not reveal themselves.
